search.query: | tstats latest(_time) as _time where index=_internal by host | append [| inputlookup all_windows_hosts.csv | eval os="Windows"] | append [| inputlookup cs_linux_user_list.csv | eval os="Linux"] | stats max(_time) as _time, last(*) as * by host | fillnull _time 0 | sort 0 _time | eval _time=if(_time=0, "---", _time) | eval last_internal_event=strftime(_time, "%F %T %z") | fillnull last_internal_event value="No _internal events in last 7 days" | table host, last_internal_event, os

panel.title: Decommission Linux Host from Linux Lookup

search.query: | inputlookup cs_linux_user_list.csv | search NOT host=$tkn_nix_remove_forwarder|s$ | outputlookup cs_linux_user_list.csv | where host="DO-NOT-RETURN-ANYRESULTS" | append [| stats count | rename count as result | eval result="Host ".$tkn_nix_remove_forwarder|s$." has been removed from the Lookup."]

html.p: Note: Query will remove the Host from the Linux User List Lookup and you will not see the host in the dashboard panel called "User List".

panel.title: Decommission Windows Host from Windows Lookup

search.query: | makeresults | eval host=$tkn_win_remove_forwarder|s$ | append [| inputlookup cs_windows_decommissioned_hosts.csv] | where _time > now() - 86400*15 | outputlookup cs_windows_decommissioned_hosts.csv | where host="DO-NOT-RETURN-ANYRESULTS" | append [| stats count | rename count as result | eval result="Host ".$tkn_win_remove_forwarder|s$." has been added to decommissioned Lookup."]

| inputlookup all_windows_hosts.csv | search NOT host=$tkn_win_remove_forwarder|s$ | outputlookup all_windows_hosts.csv | where host="DO-NOT-RETURN-ANYRESULTS" | append [| stats count | rename count as result | eval result="Host ".$tkn_win_remove_forwarder|s$." has been removed from the Lookup."]

html.p: Note: Query will remove the Host from the all_windows_hosts.csv Lookup and will keep Host in the cs_windows_decommissioned_hosts.csv lookup for 15 days.
